NousHost is based on the fast and reliable Linux and Windows operating systems. It is rigorously monitored 24/7 for any unusual activity and benchmarked continuously for its performance.

Noushost 100Mbps Netherlands Unlimited Servers are connected with volume network. Choose wide range of server configurations counting from basic to hybrid processors. These Unlimited servers are suitable for applications, which require large amount of bandwidth. The Servers are most compatible for creating Gaming Servers, Websites with Large Traffic and Databases. Whether you prefer a Windows server or Linux, We deliver dedicated servers for every major operating system.
